text:
Hi Hiral Panchal,
I think this may help you with numerical validation
1. go to the form
2. select the field which you want to restrict
3. click on edit contact property
4. select rules
5. click on restrict to numeric values in validation rules

Good morning group how are you?, I wanted to know how I can remove the static modules that are active since you select a theme, since I have a nav module that I create with code and I wanted to add as a nav, stay tuned thank you very much. :grin:
